unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Binomial Distribution: Manipulate that Binomial Standard Style
question_text:
A random variable $X$ has the probability:
$$\begin{pmatrix} 20 \\ k \end{pmatrix}(0.44)^{k}(0.56)^{20-k}$$
...associated with the value $k$ is for $k= 0,1,2,3,â€¦,20$.
What is the standard deviation of $X$?
